### getAnalysisUsage() {#a5b7801b5d05f081b0c053e5f84dabcf6}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sifixsgprcopies-cpp/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sifixsgprcopies-cpp">SIFixSGPRCopies.cpp</a>.

getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.
